About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Emir, I am 40 years old. Long time ago I discover passion for design, programming and web developpment. First I study 3D design, then I change course and I sail in to programming water. I am member of advance traning Build IT. Every day I work hard to improve my knowledge.

Full Stack Developer
